Text: MLK and Presidents Days from to removed Cc Richard I removed Martin Luther Kings Day and Presidents Day as business days from test stage and production databases Below are the list of days Truong Vu x Martin Luther Kings Day rd Monday in January JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN JAN Presidents Day rd Monday in Febuary FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB FEB Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNJGOSSET To Vu Truong OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNTvu Date Thursday September GMT Subject I approve Original Message From Vu Truong Sent Thursday September PM To Cross Richard Cc Gossett Jeffrey C Subject RE MLK and Presidents Days from to Hi Richard I only received response from Matt Brown I will send an email this afternoon before I apply the changes FYI I will make the changes to test egsdevel and stage ermttestded first before I make change to production database I am waiting on approval from Jeffrey Gossett Truong Vu x Original Message From Cross Richard Sent Thursday September AM To Vu Truong Subject RE MLK and Presidents Days from to Hi Truong Do you know when you are going to make these changes Thanks Richard Original Message From Vu Truong Sent Tuesday September PM To Baumbach David Bowen Bob Brogan Theresa T Brown Matt A Chew Carol Cross Richard Dawes Cheryl Denny Jennifer Fondren Mark Gillis Brian Giron Darron C Gossett Jeffrey C Groves Eric Hanson Kristen J Hernandez Nancy Keiser Kam Lee Kevin Love Phillip M Mao Shari McIntyre Burton Moorer Torrey Nicoll Kenny Prejean Frank Reeves Kathy Sharma Shifali Stevens Martha Swinney John Tan Gladys Taylor Dimitri Torres Carlos Wlodarski Patryk McLaughlin Jr Errol Cc Rivera Oscar Cheung Cecilia Lim Francis S Subject MLK and Presidents Days from to I prepared the list of days to add to NYMEX holidays and to remove those days from NYMEX business days for the years from to As requested by Richard Cross Please review and approve before I make the changes Truong Vu x Inline attachment follows From OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNRCROSS To Vu Truong OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNTvu CC Rivera Oscar OENRONOUNACNRECIPIENTSCNOrivera Date Friday September GMT Subject I would like to go as far as we can into the future but should be good for now Richard Original Message From Vu Truong Sent Friday September PM To Cross Richard Cc Rivera Oscar Subject RE MLK and Presidents Days Hi Richard I will be responsible for adding holidays to holidays table and removing holidays from business days tables I checked NYMEXcom they didnt publish holidays yet I requested via email for holidays To what year in the future do you want to add MLK and Presidents Days Truong Vu x Original Message From Cross Richard Sent Wednesday September PM To Rivera Oscar Sharma Shifali Cc Wong Jeremy Leggett Tim Subject RE MLK and Presidents Days OK we need to add these in as holidays then I guess we should probably do future years as well Shifali do you have a NYMEX holiday schedule Cant access the website at present Richard Original Message From Rivera Oscar Sent Wednesday September PM To Cross Richard Cc Wong Jeremy Subject RE MLK and Presidents Days Richard These two days are currently not marked as holidays under Nymex Calendar for commodity WTI Oscar Original Message From Cross Richard Sent Wednesday September PM To Rivera Oscar Subject RE MLK and Presidents Days Nymex Calendar Original Message From Rivera Oscar Sent Wednesday September PM To Cross Richard Cc Wong Jeremy Subject RE MLK and Presidents Days Richard There are currently several types of calendars available in ERMS They have different holidays Here is the list Nymex Calendar Kansas CityNymex Calendar English Calendar IPE Permian Basin NYMEX calendar Singapore Stock Exchange Nymex English IPE Calendars Tokyo Commodity Exchange Which calendars do you want us to check for those days that you are interested in Oscar Original Message From Cross Richard Sent Wednesday September PM To Wong Jeremy Rivera Oscar Subject MLK and Presidents Days Hi there Can you check for me whether the above two holidays have been removed fron the TAGGERMS calendars I believe the days are Jan and Feb respectively Thanks Richard

Restored Postids of Cc PST Kam These postids has been restored We have problem with the backup tape for postid which was calculated on April The DBA of TAGGERMS group will try to restore database for that day that process will take a while to days sorry for the inconvinient If you have any questions please contact me Regards Truong Vu x

NYMEX Holidays Cc Errol Here is the rest of NYMEX holidays we will remove as business days Presidents Day Monday FEB Good Friday Friday APR Memorial Day Monday MAY Independence Day Wednesday JUL already defined Labor Day Monday SEP Thanksgiving Day Thursday NOV Christmas Eve Monday DEC Christmas Day Tuesday DEC already defined We plan to remove these holidays tomorrow morning Wednesday FEB Truong Vu x
NYMEX Holidays Removed as business days Cc All The rest of NYMEX Holidays has been removed as business days from the database per confirmation with Errol McLaughlin Truong Vu x

Labor Days from to removed Cc Labor Days as business days for the years from to for production and stage databases The days are SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP SEP Truong Vu x

Removed March and May as business day Cc Good Friday March and Memorial Day May as business days from the Production and Stage databases Truong Vu x Original Message From Sweeney Kevin Sent Tuesday March PM To Vu Truong Cc Wei Zhiyong Husain Karima Wong Jeremy Subject FW Holidays in the outmonths Per my earlier email Please remove March and May I have already requested Labor Days per a previous emails Memorial day would be nice but other than May is not urgent Original Message From Jeffrey C Gossett Sent Monday March PM To Kevin Sweeney Subject Re Holidays in the outmonths That is fine OLE Object Picture Device Independent Bitmap Kevin Sweeney PM To Jeffrey C CT Michelle nronXGate John nronXGate cc Matt A nronXGate Subject Holidays in the outmonths In the Thunderball application we have a view of the ERMS calendars and look to those calendars to be valid in terms of business days versus holidays The most critical issue is when an averaging period for global products normally a calendar month start or end date is falling on a holiday that is currently marked on the ERMS calendar as a business day I have requested that all labor days be removed from the calendar since it is the first Monday of each September A couple of others are jumping out as potential issues Memorial Day and Good Friday Memorial day is the last Monday of each May and when Good Friday falls in March it can fall on or around month end If nobody has any issues I want to remove the following days March Good Friday May Memorial Day Labor Days per my previous emails Memorial Days in general as they are the last Monday of each May Most other holidays fall within the month and consequently are not as critical Let me know if there are any issues Thanks Kevin

Removed Memorial Days for the years to Cc New Year Days Holiday Monday January as business day I removed Memorial Days as business days for the years from to for ERMSTAGG Production and Stage databases The days are MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY MAY Truong Vu Enron Net Works LLC

Removed March and May as business day Cc Good Friday March and Memorial Day May as business days from the Production and Stage databases Truong Vu x Original Message From Sweeney Kevin Sent Tuesday March PM To Vu Truong Cc Wei Zhiyong Husain Karima Wong Jeremy Subject FW Holidays in the outmonths Per my earlier email Please remove March and May I have already requested Labor Days per a previous emails Memorial day would be nice but other than May is not urgent Original Message From Jeffrey C Gossett Sent Monday March PM To Kevin Sweeney Subject Re Holidays in the outmonths That is fine OLE Object Picture Device Independent Bitmap Kevin Sweeney PM To Jeffrey C CT Michelle nronXGate John nronXGate cc Matt A nronXGate Subject Holidays in the outmonths In the Thunderball application we have a view of the ERMS calendars and look to those calendars to be valid in terms of business days versus holidays The most critical issue is when an averaging period for global products normally a calendar month start or end date is falling on a holiday that is currently marked on the ERMS calendar as a business day I have requested that all labor days be removed from the calendar since it is the first Monday of each September A couple of others are jumping out as potential issues Memorial Day and Good Friday Memorial day is the last Monday of each May and when Good Friday falls in March it can fall on or around month end If nobody has any issues I want to remove the following days March Good Friday May Memorial Day Labor Days per my previous emails Memorial Days in general as they are the last Monday of each May Most other holidays fall within the month and consequently are not as critical Let me know if there are any issues Thanks Kevin
